docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The unusual heat across the United States this summer is overwhelming vulnerable people, especially the elderly, and will be responsible for thousands of deaths, an expert on health and the environment says.

headline.main: Experts Fear Summer Heat Will Lead to Rise in Deaths

docs.snippet: LEAD: The unusual heat across the United States this summer is overwhelming vulnerable people, especially the elderly, and will be responsible for thousands of deaths, an expert on health and the environment says.
